name: XRPermissionStatus
description: The XRPermissionStatus interface defines the object returned by calling navigator.permissions.query() for the xr permission name; it indicates whether or not the app or site has permission to use WebXR, an may be monitored over time for changes to that permissions tate.

refs.name: WebXR Device API
refs.description: The definition of 'XRPermissionStatus' in the 'WebXR Device API' specification.
